item.title: HackTheBox Writeup - Crafty Room
item.author: krishnannavadia@gmail.com (g4nd1v)
item.description: Crafty Title Crafty Description HTB Windows Easy Machine Difficulty Easy Maker TheCyberGeek & felamos Enumeration Starting with Nmap, └─$ nmap -sC -sV -oA nmap/crafty 10.10.11.249 Starting Nmap 7.94SVN ( https://nmap.org ) at 2024-06-21 07:28 EDT Nmap scan report for 10.10.11.249 Host is up (0.11s latency). Not shown: 999 filtered tcp ports (no-response) PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 80/tcp open http Microsoft IIS httpd 10.0 |_http-server-header: Microsoft-IIS/10.0 |_http-title: Did not follow redirect to http://crafty.
